headline: Vistra Declares Dividend on Common Stock, Series B Preferred Stock and Series C Preferred Stock
summary: Vistra (NYSE: VST) announced today that its board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.2250 per share of Vistra's common stock, reflecting an estimated aggregate payment of approximately $75 million this quarter. This represents an approximate 3% increase in the company's quarterly common stock dividend per share from its second quarter 2024 dividend. The common dividend is payable on June 30, 2025, to common stockholders of record as of June 18, 2025. The ex-dividend date for th

headline: Ameren (AEE) Q1 Earnings Miss Estimates
summary: Ameren (AEE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -0.93% and 5.73%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
